html:
Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_dnupm6rl&referenceId=1_dnupm6rl&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: Wall Street futures indicate a mixed open ahead of the key U.S. jobs report, which is likely to point to slowing jobs growth. Amazon could see its shares stage its biggest percentage gain since October 2009 after its results. Pinterest's Q4 sales rose, but monthly active users fell. Ford's bullish forecast failed to lift its shares ahead of the opening bell.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3ojypvN
